archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.1.6: Assurance should be obtained from suppliers/manufacturers about the level of security provided by their products (e.g. by producing results of security-related tests, vulnerability assessments and adherence to technical standards).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
